  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CommitQueue  
    CoreCmd  
    CoreMember
    This class is an actor inboxes - the command queue and incoming messages.
    CoreMember.Latency
    Used to measure latency between two different points in the code.
    Message
    Represents a Raft message in byte array form.
    MessageHandler
    The implementation methods in this class should not release the message.
    MessagePool  
    Peer
    This class represents a remote member.
    Rid
    In the code, the term/index pair is called a 'Raft ID'.
    SaveQueue
    This class parallelizes the insertion of log entries into the storage system.
